document.topic_text: [[Charles Boyer]] who played Mr. Gasse was caricatured in Disney's ''[[The Autograph Hound]]'' [[Charles Boyer]] who played Mr. Gasse was caricatured in Disney's ''[[The Autograph Hound]]'' − [[Peter Lorre]] who played a Steward was [[Conseil]] in Disney's ''[[20,000 Leagues Under The Sea]]'' (2 years before playing the Steward in another non-Disney movie based on [[Jules Verne]] novels) + [[Peter Lorre]] who played a Steward was [[Conseil]] in Disney's ''[[20,000 Leagues Under the Sea]]'' (2 years before playing the Steward in another non-Disney movie based on [[Jules Verne]] novels) − [[Glynis Johns]] who played a Sporting Lady's companion was [[Winifred Banks|Mrs. Winifred Banks]] in ''[[Mary Poppins]]'' (not to mention she was the fomer wife of the late actor of [[Will Scarlet (1952 character)|Will Scarlet]] in that ''Robin Hood'' movie,[[Anthony Forewood ]] ) + [[Glynis Johns]] who played a Sporting Lady's companion was [[Winifred Banks|Mrs. Winifred Banks]] in ''[[Mary Poppins]]'' (not to mention she was the fomer wife of the late actor of [[Will Scarlet (1952 character)|Will Scarlet]] in that ''Robin Hood'' movie, [[Anthony Forwood|Anthony Forwood) ]]
document.post: [[Charles Boyer]] who played Mr. Gasse was caricatured in Disney's ''[[The Autograph Hound]]'' [[Charles Boyer]] who played Mr. Gasse was caricatured in Disney's ''[[The Autograph Hound]]'' − [[Peter Lorre]] who played a Steward was [[Conseil]] in Disney's ''[[20,000 Leagues Under The Sea]]'' (2 years before playing the Steward in another non-Disney movie based on [[Jules Verne]] novels) + [[Peter Lorre]] who played a Steward was [[Conseil]] in Disney's ''[[20,000 Leagues Under the Sea]]'' (2 years before playing the Steward in another non-Disney movie based on [[Jules Verne]] novels) − [[Glynis Johns]] who played a Sporting Lady's companion was [[Winifred Banks|Mrs. Winifred Banks]] in ''[[Mary Poppins]]'' (not to mention she was the fomer wife of the late actor of [[Will Scarlet (1952 character)|Will Scarlet]] in that ''Robin Hood'' movie,[[Anthony Forewood ]] ) + [[Glynis Johns]] who played a Sporting Lady's companion was [[Winifred Banks|Mrs. Winifred Banks]] in ''[[Mary Poppins]]'' (not to mention she was the fomer wife of the late actor of [[Will Scarlet (1952 character)|Will Scarlet]] in that ''Robin Hood'' movie, [[Anthony Forwood|Anthony Forwood) ]]
